title: LoL crashes after recording
body: So when i start to record any match on 1080p its just automatically crash just when i pres the record button but when its on 720p everything is okay...any ideas why and how to fix it ? I´ve already send a crash report (wich appears after the crash) 2weeks ago and no respond.

replies.body: Does the crash result in a bugsplat?  There could be a driver issue failing to render the replay tool.  Try out the steps in the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to tune up your PC a bit and help rule out some possibilities.  Let me know how that works out for you.
im using laptop and screen is 15.6 and max resolution is 1366x768...might that be the problem ? http://prntscr.com/fsee58 these are the details when bugsplat appears after crash :)
Nope, as long as you're not exceeding 1920x1080 it should be fine.  Were you able to run through the crash guide?
Yeah i´ve just run through the crash guide and unfortunetaly it didnt help :( i even tried to set all setting in game to the lowest but same result as before :(

Sorry to hear the issue is still going on.  Don't worry, though, we can help!  Grab some logs from our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and attach them to a ticket.  Our tech team will take a look and work with you directly to get this figured out!

Same, except mine was a custom game and I skipped to a certain time in the match.
What mode was yours in?  Any other details you remember?
it crashes in any mode at 1080p.... at 720p everything is okay as i said might be the problem that my max resolution on laptop is 1366x768 ?

I fiddled with a few things and I can manage to make it record at 1080p if I change my resolution, save it, and then switch it back again.  (Sounds stupid right ^^")
If I don't shift it from 1280x720 to anything and then back again it _always_ crashes.

Could you check to see if that works on your end too?
Same problem, it used to work well but now it just crashes the game instantly (i've not tried the different video qualities though)
